properties.name: at.rechnerherz.aoprofiling.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable aspect oriented profiling.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.aoprofiling.ignore
properties.description: A comma-separated list of target.method names to ignore.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.aoprofiling.mode
properties.description: Display mode: TREE adds line drawings to the call tree, VERBOSE prints to multiple lines, PLAIN does neither.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.aoprofiling.truncate
properties.description: Strings will be truncated to at most this number of characters, unless mode is VERBOSE.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.aoprofiling.profilingAspectOrder
properties.description: Order of the ProfilingAspect. Should be lower than the transaction advisor order.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.aoprofiling.profilingSummaryAspectOrder
properties.description: Order of the ProfilingSummaryAspect. Should be lower than the profilingAspectOrder.
